page.title: 16TRANSPORT
page.content:
{Road}is the only means of transport in this area.People really need to have their own means of transport,as public transport is now very limited. Most families have at least 1 car and some more. { { Public transport}is on most days restricted to one bus to Northallerton in the morning and one bus making the return journey in the evening.On market days there is another bus put on to allow people to reach the market.
Some of the minor roads are very narrow and slow-moving farm vehicles can hold up the traffic at times.
